desc: Welcome to Calavera Coolers. Our mission is to create a brand about people. Building Calavera is more than coolers, cups, and apparel. It's about creating another resource to help give back and support our communities. The Calavera brand is a reminder that our loved ones we lost live forever through us. Visit for more!

layout.text: Calavera Coolers are not just ice cold, they are CALAVERA COLD!
